name: Grave Guard
description:
The web build may need a minute to load. If it is slow, consider downloading the game instead.

You're out visiting your recently deceased friend's grave, when you're suddenly interrupted by a very rude horde of monster's.

Take out your gun and show them how to respect the dead!

Grave Guard is a small top-down shooter, made in 48hours for Spook2D Jam 2021.

Waves of monsters will try to attack your friend's grave, ward them off and give your friend the rest they deserve!

After each wave, you can pick either a trick of a treat - each throwing some extra spice into the game.

Controls:

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys 

Shoot/Aim - Mouse

Note: There are a whole load of bugs and the camera shake can get pretty intense.

Programming & SFX by: Pneuma

Art & Animation by: FlappyFanks

Music by: Oscar

Beat the dev's!

- Pneuma: 6 waves

- FlappyFanks: 4 waves
